name: Academy of Carver Aviation Pvt. Ltd.
about: Academy of Carver Aviation Pvt. Ltd., established in 1995, is a renowned aviation school in Pune, Maharashtra, certified by the DGCA and ISO 9001:2015. The institution offers a range of programs including Commercial Pilot License (CPL), Private Pilot License (PPL), Aircraft Maintenance Engineering (AME), and Multi-Engine Endorsement. With experienced and professional faculty, the academy provides quality education and practical training using state-of-the-art simulators and aircraft like the Diamond DA40-42 and C90 Cessna. The campus features modern infrastructure, including a private flying club, hostel facilities, and sports amenities. Carver Aviation is committed to preparing students for successful careers in aviation, with a strong record of placements in top airlines like Go Air. The academy's comprehensive training and supportive environment make it an ideal choice for aspiring pilots and aviation professionals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
